fusetools.office_tools.PDF¶

class fusetools.office_tools.PDF[source]¶

Bases: object

Functions for interacting with PDFs.

Methods

merger

Combine multiple PDFs into one.
classmethod merger(output_path, input_paths)[source]¶

Combine multiple PDFs into one.

Parameters

  • output_path – Output path of merged PDFs.

  • input_paths – Input paths of PDFs to merge.

Returns

Combined PDF.
